page.title: 11The Council Offices, Codsall
page.content: The Engineers Department are also in charge of Country Parks and other public open spaces The Housing Department provides Council housing for people to rent. At the moment the Council are building bungalows for elderly people which will be more convenient for them and will free more large houses for family use. They also provide houses for the home- less and run a sheltered housing scheme The Treasurers Department controls the money which the South Staffordshire District Council receives through rates which are based on the value of property. The Planning Department decides whether land is suitable for housing and it controls home improvement grants for older property. The SSDC coat of arms reflects local connections including the Royal Oak of Boscobel House.
